bibl.title: Theban Ostraca. Part I, Hieratic Texts, ed. A.H. Gardiner; Part II, Demotic Texts, ed. H. Thompson; Part III, Greek Texts, ed. J.G. Milne; Part IV, Coptic Texts, ed. H. Thompson.

series.title: University of Toronto Studies, Philological Series

bibl.note: Part I, Hieratic Texts, ed. A.H. Gardiner; 31 texts on pp. 1—16 with an additional text in an appendix on pp. 16a—16o. Part II, Demotic Texts, ed. H. Thompson; 44 texts not numbered serially on pp. 23—65. Part III, Greek Texts, ed. J.G. Milne; nos. 1—146 on pp. 71—161 with Demotic in nos. 16, 21—26, 28 and 31. Part IV, Coptic Texts, ed. H. Thompson; nos. 1—48 on pp. 179—212.
